is.merkor.core
Class ClusterDictionaryDB

java.lang.Object
  is.merkor.core.ClusterDictionaryDB
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClusterDictionary
public class ClusterDictionaryDB
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClusterDictionary

An implementation of the ClusterDictionary interface using a Hibernate layer to connect to database representation of the MerkOr data.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Anna B. Nikulasdottir

Method Detail

getClustersMatching

public java.util.List<ClusterCBC> getClustersMatching(java.lang.String domainRegex)
Retrieves all net.merkor.database.data.ClusterCBC with names matching domainRegex. The matching is case insensitive and allowed wildcards are: '*', '.*', '?', and '.?', as well as postgresql wildcards '%' and '_'.

Specified by:
getClustersMatching in interface ClusterDictionary
Parameters:
domainRegex - the regex to match against domain names
Returns:
a List of ClusterCBC, or an empty List if nothing is found
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if param is null

Retrieves all Cluster names (domain names) from the MerkOr data.

Specified by:

Returns:
a List of Cluster names

getClusterById

public Cluster getClusterById(java.lang.Long id)
Description copied from interface: ClusterDictionary
Returns the Cluster with the unique id.

Specified by:
getClusterById in interface ClusterDictionary
Parameters:
id - the id of a Cluster
Returns:
a Cluster, returns null if a Cluster with id does not exist.
